job_tasks.justification: The title explicitly identifies the role as a 'Software Engineer', indicating a focus on traditional software development and integration tasks as defined in this category.

profile.rationale: The job title 'Software Engineer' indicates a primary focus on software development and integration (Macro-Category A). The specialization 'ML Threat Detection' implies that the software being built or maintained will incorporate Machine Learning capabilities for threat detection, making it an AI-powered system. This aligns with the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, where the core is software engineering, and AI/ML is a feature of the product.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is extremely brief, containing only a title. This lack of detail makes it impossible to infer specific job tasks, technologies, or soft skills with any meaningful confidence. The profile assignment is based solely on the interpretation of the title.
